newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue with using search throughout the application.
== Enhancements ==
* Added POS facilities for manufacturing rigs.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the codebase to make EVEMon a better application.
